entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
